description: Defines Pydantic data models for handling query requests and responses in a multi-source retrieval system, including request parameters and retrieved chunk metadata.

classes.name: QueryRequest
classes.description: Represents a user's natural language query along with optional filters and the number of top results to retrieve.

classes.name: RetrievedChunk
classes.description: Represents a chunk of retrieved text with associated score and metadata.

classes.name: QueryResponse
classes.description: Contains the answer (if any), list of retrieved chunks, and citations for a query.

methods.name: QueryRequest
methods.description: Constructor for query request parameters, including query string, optional filters, and top-k parameter.

methods.name: RetrievedChunk
methods.description: Constructor for a retrieved text chunk with score and metadata.

methods.name: QueryResponse
methods.description: Constructor for the response containing answer, chunks, and citations.

ctags.name: answer
ctags.pattern: /^    answer: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Placeholder\/simple answer for Phase 1")$/

ctags.name: chunks
ctags.pattern: /^    chunks: List[RetrievedChunk] = Field(default_factory=list, description="Top retrieved chunks/

ctags.name: citations
ctags.pattern: /^    citations: List[Dict[str, Any]] = Field(default_factory=list, description="Citations placeho/

ctags.name: filters
ctags.pattern: /^    filters: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = Field(default=None, description="Optional metadata filte/

ctags.name: query
ctags.pattern: /^    query: str = Field(..., description="User's natural language query")$/

ctags.name: top_k
ctags.pattern: /^    top_k: int = Field(default=8, description="Number of chunks to return")$/
